title: --NATURAL LIGHT--WATER VIEW--ROOMATES ARE WELCOME
posting_body: ['--NATURAL LIGHT--WATER VIEW--ROOMATES ARE WELCOME', 'Listing ID #: 212874', 'Price: $3,265', 'Property Type: Condo', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Dishwasher', 'Granite Kitchen', 'High Ceilings', 'Light', 'Marble Bath', 'Renovated', 'River View', 'Walk In Closet', 'Stunning water view for this convertible TWO Bedrooms has beautiful finishes and outstanding lighting Great shares for three with living area.', 'The apartment features renovated kitchen with stainless appliances and granite counter tops.', 'Large closets space and good sized living room.', 'Each bedrooms have a big size window and fits a queen sized bed .Bathroom is finished with Italian marble from Carrara .The', "Apartment it's located in the hart of Financial District a few steps from several subways, actually near the 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, C, E, J, M, R, and W lines and a wide array of museums, bars, restaurants and shopping.", 'BUILDING AMENITIES 10,000 Square Foot Lounge 24-Hour Doorman Bike Room Billiard Tables Card Tables Card-Operated Laundry Facility Concierge Services Conference Room Fitness Center Free Lounge WiFi Grand Piano On-Site Parking Garage Screening Room Sun Deck TV Viewing Room', 'CONTACT MARCO TO SCHEDULE A PRIVATE VIEWING EMAIL/MOBILE <URL> (917)353-3448 TEXT FOR FASTER RESPONSE', 'Marco Bianchi', 'Phone: 9173533448', 'Mobile: 9173533448', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 9173533448 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Marco Bianchi at 9173533448']
